summary: Defines an abstract FileSystem interface that encapsulates common file operations (read, write, existence checks, directory handling, etc.) for use throughout the Raster Vision framework, enabling interchangeable local and cloud storage backends.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, pluggable storage layer that allows geospatial data processing pipelines to work transparently with different storage providers (e.g., local disk, S3, GCS) without changing application code.
